user.title: Connect to Sonorium
user.description: Enter the URL of your Sonorium instance. This is typically the Home Assistant URL with the Sonorium port (default: 8009).

data_description.url: The URL to your Sonorium addon (e.g., http://homeassistant.local:8009)
